When new location-related technologies arrive, Monmouth will be ready for them because so many of its features are described in Wikipedia articles with embedded geographical data.
data.partBlankContent: Monmouth also illustrates the value of open and free content in the sustainability of a project. People a__ presently encou_____ to acc___ the lo___ articles thr____ multilingual QR codes th__ can b_ read wi__ a mob___ phone, but techn_____ will mo__ on. When new location-related technologies arrive, Monmouth will be ready for them because so many of its features are described in Wikipedia articles with embedded geographical data.
data.answer: 蒙茅斯还说明了开放和免费内容在项目可持续性中的价值。目前，人们被鼓励通过手机可阅读的多语种QR码来阅读当地文章，但技术会不断进步。该项目的主要成就是大量的免费内容，这些内容可以被不断地混合和重新利用。当新的与地理位置相关的技术到来时，蒙茅斯已经做好了准备，因为维基百科的文章中已经用嵌入式地理数据描述了蒙茅斯的许多特性。
